question: Claire is required to submit a 188-page assignment. She already finished writing 1/4 of the assignment. How many pages does she have left to write?
answer:
Claire has already written 1/4 of the assignment which is 188 pages*1/4 = <<188*1/4=47>>47 pages.
So, she still needs to write 188 pages - 47 pages = <<188-47=141>>141 pages.
#### 141
